MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:30PM in the LL18 postcode area of Rhyl following reports of a safety issue on an underground cable. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:40PM on 24th January 2021
